subject: Engagement of fee (toll) collecting agency for collection of fee
text: HRd4 <5i4 <TATf wifuqoT PHONE : 91-11-5074100 /5074200 Fax 91-16-5093507/5093514 (13v 4aaw < Tot4rif TAT) Extn; : 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 6, SECTOA-+0, DWARKA, NEW DELHX-11O04S No. NHAI/ 13013/15/02-03/CO-CMD/ Valsad 8.11.2002 All PIU / CMUs NHAI Circular no. NHAI/ Commercial Operations/ 10 Sub: Engagement of fee (toll} collecting agency for collection of fee In partial modification of instruction vide 'circular no_ NHAI/ Commercial Operations/7 dated 9.10.02 and in continuation of instruction vide circular no. NHAI/ Commercial Operations/9 dated 22.10.02 Competent Authority has approved that for departmental collection of fees (toll) whether on stretches/sections of highways, bridges, bypass or tunnels, agencies sponsored by the office of Directorate General of Resettlement only, will be engaged by the concerned Project Director on assessment of various factors like their resources, experience and cost etc: Please acknowledge: L6 (M M Lohia} GM (Commercial Operations) submitted to Members/ CGMs] CVO GMs at HQ PS to the Chairman Copy
